name: places/ChIJTbcrSaNZwokRDXgcY4uPEL8
adrFormatAddress: 650 6th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Menswear chain offering brand-name suits, casual attire, shoes & accessories, plus tuxedo rentals.

originalText.text: DON’T GO TO THIS STORE! This store has the worst customer service in the city. I was happily trying on a few clothes in the fitting room (which had no employee working there to give directions) and there was a clothing rail with clothes that previous customers had left there. At some point, the manager came to fitting room and since I was the only one there at the time, he simply assumed I had left all that clothes there. He was extremely rude, unprofessional, disrespectful, and made me feel very uncomfortable! He simply ASSUMED I left that clothes there. It was a clear sign that he didn’t want people using the EMPTY fitting room of his EMPTY store. Pretty pathetic and incoherent behavior. No wonder why the store was empty. Maybe the manager has a sort of dissociation of the reality and thinks he manages a luxury, expensive store in the fifth avenue, but he better be more competent if wants to achieve that. Having such an EMPTY store in a weekend in the middle of the holidays, in a store with good items and affordable prices (AGAIN, not a luxury store that maybe the manager thinks he manages), it seems a clear sign of TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE and incompetent management. For the owners: pay attention at the behavior of the manager managing your store. For potential customers: go spend your valuable money somewhere else. Stay away of this place.

originalText.text: I bought my first tuxedo here, and it took forever to get service. When I went to pick it up after I got it tailored, they gave it to me in a plastic bag.

text.text: I bought my first tuxedo here, and it took forever to get service. When I went to pick it up after I got it tailored, they gave it to me in a plastic bag.

originalText.text: Really unhappy with my experience here. First, the salesperson measured my collar incorrectly and gave me the wrong sized dress shirt. Did not try on in store, and tried it on at home. Came back to the store to return it and the manager was incredibly rude. I wasn’t even asking for my money back- was asking for the correct size or even a store credit and the manager would not do anything!! So much for 100% satisfaction!

originalText.text: Will and Nat truly gave me a fantastic experience I was able to purchase my dress shoes brown colored that I desired, and they fit perfect Nat was very informative and patient to make sure I had what I needed and will make sure the attire that I was looking for especially the color of my dress pants were top notch and I would be satisfied completely so I personally believe anybody meeting Excellent tailoring or apparel attire help this is the place to go with the best team

originalText.text: Good service, low quality product. The employee did a great job helping me pick out a suit but unfortunately the sole of one of the shoes I bought started to peel off after the first time wearing them
